name: Liberty
description:
Short narrative game made on Bitsy for the GTMK game jam 2020 whose theme was: "Out of control".

Full playthrough time: ~10 minutes.

/!\ Use of violence, strong language, self-harm. /!\

This is the full version of our game jam game ( https://yorshiki.itch.io/libertygamejam ).
Even though many things could be improved, we won't change them as our engine, Bitsy, is too limited to do it reliably with the size of that project: we don't want to risk to bring more bugs.
However, we got a lot of feedback that we will use on new projects :)

Credits:
Ambre "Yorshiki" Dautry: assets, game design, dialogues.
Choléra : assets, game design, code.
Malleek: help on preproduction.

Playtest (in no particular order): Malleek, Bidouche, Amandine, Louis, Paul, Cernunos, Phébée, Nyr.

Bitsy game maker: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

Oh by the way, there are two main endings ;)
